title: Long Pig
description: Sister Angelina ranked with the lowest in her commune, despite being the priest's wife. After all, the position of priestess was already filled by a woman of great power. Angelina never questioned this. She never questioned the thrall in which her husband held her. She had no questions at all, until the brothers brought in a child whose spirit was too bright and who asked too many questions.
author: Gloria Piper
